sentence: Montellaro and Kruse quote Parscale as saying, “Jim Renacci's the only Trump candidate, and it is clear from the data that Mike DeWine is the anti-Trump candidate.” How well Renacci would perform against a Democratic nominee in the general election remains to be seen.
